europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 37. Types of the Chloropseidae and Irenidae
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Dickinson E.C.
Dekker R.W.R.J.
Eck S.
Somadikarta S.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Chloropseidae
leafbirds
Irenidae
fairy bluebirds
types
type species
lectotype designations
europeana:record.dc:description: A list of about 50 names applied to species of leafbirds (family Chloropseidae) and 15 names applied to species of fairy bluebirds (family Irenidae) is presented. This list provides information on the whereabouts of a type. Where our information does not include reliable data we provide notes to explain the deficit and to stimulate others to offer additional data or sources of information.
europeana:record.dcterms:alternative: Corrigenda published in ZV 350 (2004), p. 203, and in: Zoologische Mededelingen 80-5 (2006) p. 317
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 37. Types of the Chloropseidae and Irenidae (Volume 344)
